
Two users mistakenly shared a prime when generating RSA keys. Both encrypted their flags: 110459691684459947283972827753536030999098047922818595671681621685983080877664933951568519987153011577506951373754185347648792211633043247280905021454211750739997793491901924100670085354453305063072363167086081550636023893104944010. Can you recover one of the flags?


The flag format is flag{...}
n=1059719498035991992754567653560868726902762172701862771859165302350947588508532771219397366150014365481703706943687508915400437699785521222202110523131657590939337669854823325900044849620351604415430834083929424471385478215574290063, n2=1137115529345998282921380893460093559118520440491381736012068169681698255618552285532971463969407560779185646129355991674007315203632870530784742622945214927641217469304354712620449663743350111592384050595968439590684632746461719181, e=915698052130215861115719996104383626336842544080186986770211103253542748873867626415179510184872283696708116073416748321462159332966150247254588961894278875217619636775870487284287385829349347257762161076866736696224171921153035749

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{6rkrl1z7}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 110459691684459947283972827753536030999098047922818595671681621685983080877664933951568519987153011577506951373754185347648792211633043247280905021454211750739997793491901924100670085354453305063072363167086081550636023893104944010
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=1059719498035991992754567653560868726902762172701862771859165302350947588508532771219397366150014365481703706943687508915400437699785521222202110523131657590939337669854823325900044849620351604415430834083929424471385478215574290063, n2=1137115529345998282921380893460093559118520440491381736012068169681698255618552285532971463969407560779185646129355991674007315203632870530784742622945214927641217469304354712620449663743350111592384050595968439590684632746461719181, e=915698052130215861115719996104383626336842544080186986770211103253542748873867626415179510184872283696708116073416748321462159332966150247254588961894278875217619636775870487284287385829349347257762161076866736696224171921153035749
extra_info: p=31818574193910489329576551431364681888868046726385092157255190343613239495791909568911793804249005031371612650849609, q=33305059226657727054733483644168400821262314878943057120278814303839939955043491723551568638170427471109994940669207, q2=35737475928874965865826449955279603771186774027985767133985382524033114088524499345435746261334901534098890245910309, φ(n)=1059719498035991992754567653560868726902762172701862771859165302350947588508532771219397366150014365481703706943687443791767017131569136912167034990048947460577732341705545791895397396440900769014138370721487005038882996607982771248, φ(n2)=1137115529345998282921380893460093559118520440491381736012068169681698255618552285532971463969407560779185646129355924117957192418177675127783355978659554872820463098445063472047582017389765795183469703055902855684119162243564959264
